always_allow.description: Fields that are always included in user input variables and implemented, even if computed
always_allow.title: Always Allow

never_allow.description: Fields that are never included in user input variables or implemented, often due to support/deprecation issues
never_allow.title: Never Allow

always_sensitive.description: Fields that should always be marked sensitive in the outputs
always_sensitive.title: Always Sensitive

provider.description: Terraform provider name to pull the resource from
provider.title: Provider

resource.description: Terraform resource from the specified provider to generate a wrapper module
resource.title: Resource

fields.description: Configuration for logic related to fields

additional_providers.description: Additional providers to include in the generated version file
additional_providers.title: Additional Providers
